faqMenu.message: FAQ — choose the topic you’re curious about.

responses.documents: Most destinations require a passport valid for at least 6 months after return. If a visa is needed, we’ll share the checklist and help with the appointment.
responses.payment: Pay by bank transfer, card, or cash. A 30–50% deposit is usually enough — the balance is due before departure.
responses.kids: We’ll recommend family-friendly hotels with kids’ clubs, pools, and nanny services — just tell us the ages.
responses.refund: Refund terms depend on the operator and fare. We’ll outline potential fees and deadlines in advance.
responses.insurance: A basic insurance policy is typically included. We can expand the coverage to match your plans.
responses.luggage: Airlines set the baggage rules. We’ll confirm what’s included and help add extra allowance if you need it.
responses.transfers: An airport–hotel transfer comes by default. Private cars and minivans are available too.
responses.weather: Each destination page has seasonal highlights and a month-by-month temperature chart. I can send the link and help pick the best timing.
responses.deals: We track promos and specials constantly. A manager will check current prices and shortlist the best fits.
